评论详情: True to size. Pretty dress

The material is nice. Has a little metallic type sheen. Snap up in the chest area. But either the one I got was a defect or the design is.  Right between chest and waist it "bubbled". Didn't lie flat.  Just didn't fit or look right. If it didn't do that I would have loved it.

评论概述: Dress is not sheer and has no sheer layers
评论详情: Dress does not look as pictured.
The arms were alittle tight but i figured it out
I’m 5’2, 108lbs, 34D, and an XS fits great. There’s one snap in the neckline, which lays nicely.  I used my steamer to get the wrinkles out easily.  Looks cute with tall boots, wedges, and heels.

评论概述: Cute but ripped before I wore it.
评论详情: I loved the style and fit but it was ripped before I wore it and beyond the return window. Poor quality.
There’s nothing I didn’t like about this dress. It was perfect for a November wedding! Size small fit me perfectly. The only thing I had to do was gently iron out the wrinkles on a low temp setting.

The dress is not at all what I wanted. This dress has been in my cart since Easter! Almost a full year of me watching it and wanting to buy/wear it. Found something else for Easter. Again as a wedding guest, but chose something else. Again at Thanksgiving but chose something else. Finally purchased for a party - and I am so disappointed. The material is cheap. The snap closure in the front doesn't sit flat. The color/design is the worst part! The navy is very dark. The florals - there are no white flowers - they are pink and muted. All the colors are muted. The yellow is sad. I had such high hopes for this dress but returned it for such terrible color/pattern is not as pictured.

Fit well and the person who bought it for me (mine was a gift) said the material was better than she expected. The main part of the dress is two layers while the sleeves are more see-through colored mesh. It was exactly as advertised in my opinion. I would buy again or from the same brand. The only thing is the neckline closes with a small snap which has popped open a few times with regular movement. So i may sew or pin that closed. It’s generally fine though as long as i don’t reach too far back. Other than this flaw, it is a nice dress and comfortable. I have gotten several compliments in the times wearing it so far.
Material was thin, felt cheap, and didn’t fit right almost like it was sewn crooked. Item was returned

评论概述: Worth it but pay attention to the boobs
评论详情: Amazing dress. Super cute, flattering, colors we're bright and true to the picture. Ordered for a "mountain fancy" wedding in Utah.  I'm 5'5-5'6ish and about 210 here with a 44C bra size. Bought the XL in green.  The length felt shorter than it looked because of the liner but I stayed covered. Will definitely ride up when you life you arms over your head (see unflattering second photo of me trying to catch my hat lol).  My only complaint is that the boob snap does not stay closed. Other reviews said the same too. Even trying to sit up straight with my shoulders back popped that bad boy. I gave up trying to keep it closed because it was a wedding but for a professional or more reserved setting use caution. It won't be as modest as you think.  Overall I love the dress and will be ordering more but in a size up so I can use them for work and have a bit of extra length and chest security.

评论概述: It is lined but the sleeves are sheer. Beware the snap!
评论详情: Well, it is lovely right out of the bag. However,the front snap does not stay closed if you have a larger chest.

Let me start with I very rarely do reviews, but this dress deserves one. I’m 5 ft and about 120 lbs. this dress was so flattering. I got a small and it fit perfectly. I did add a belt to it and the boots made it pop too, but omg I felt so beautiful and got tons of compliments.
Cute and flattering

This is a great dress. I was looking for something fun for a New Year’s party that was versatile to be worn for other occasions, and this dress is perfect. You can dress it down with boots and a denim jacket or dress it up with jewelry and heels/flats. I’d wear it to a party, the theater, a funeral or wedding. It’s long enough to be appropriate for most occasions (I’m 5’6” and it hits a little above the knee) and would be flattering on most body types. It’s lined and made of as good quality material as many other more expensive dresses I’ve bought.
The dress I received smells like perfume, has deodorant stains and snags on the front. Someone obviously wore it and then returned it. Now I get to  return it.

评论概述: Bello pero no apto si tienes much seno
评论详情: El vestido es lindo, tipo coctel pero no me gusta como me queda a mi en la parte de arriba.

评论概述: Size up if you have wide shoulders
评论详情: My daughter is 5’7” and 180lbs. The large fits but is snug on the shoulders (she has wide shoulders)
I am a petite (size 0-2)  and this dress was huge. Too long and just big all over..

Cute flowy fall dress with sheer sleeves. Pairs well with or without a jean jacket or cardigan, boots, booties or sandals… I’ve worn it with all and also just the dress alone some simple jewelry, handbag and cute sandals. This is a great go to for the office, winery day, date nite or wedding. Great dress for the money. Just remind them to send the belt.***

I ordered this dress for my work Christmas party. It was beautiful and lightweight but had to return it due to the chest area being too tight and the button popping open with every breath. I ordered a large and it fit perfectly, except the chest area. Afraid to order a XL cuz then the dress will be overall too big.
This dress was not the right look. Poor quality and waistband was too high. Reminded me of a maternity dress.
Super cute and a great fit, but it is completely see through.
Material is not comfortable. It irritates your skin. Fit is true to size. If you have a larger chest like me, the dress isn’t flattering.
Fix perfect. Fabric was nice. Washed nice.
This dress is sized great and is really cute and flowy. Great dress for the price.
Comfy and cute!
Very flattering and cute. Wore this for fall family photos.

Runs small. I ordered Med bc that is my size on everything I buy. The Med fit like a Small. I ordered a large that fit like a Med. Also the dress is not flattering to the body. I felt much larger with my body shape wearing this dress. Maybe better for teens than a 35 year old. I had many comments that the dress was beautiful. I liked the sleeves and the feel of the dress. It is light weight. I wore it to Thanksgiving with leggings and tall boots it was a cute outfit.
The look was pretty but the material was thin so it was not flattering. I returned it.

For reference… I’m 5’3, 145 and 34DDD and I ordered a medium. Definitely needs to be steamed as others have stated. My only issue was too much cleavage. I don’t like any showing at all.. I simply put a tank with some lace at the top under and it worked well. It also was a tad shorter than I liked but not too short by any means.. depends on how modest you are! But the dress looked nice and I was happy with it!
This is a very pretty dress and I really want to like it, but did not look nice on me. Returned it
This dress is exactly what the picture shows. Flowy, soft and romantic feeling. It’s a little short and lightweight so may want some shorts underneath or leggings.

评论概述: Beautiful dress but VERY DELICATE should hand wash only
评论详情: Beautiful dress but VERY DELICATE should hand wash only. The stitching came apart and almost unraveled the dress in the waist area. I don’t think this could survive washing in a machine even if on delicate cycle. Very comfy to wear I find it a bit overpriced for what it is.
Fabric feels very cheap and light weight. Also snagged on my purse within seconds of wearing it. Not worth the price.
Cheaply made.  Runs kinda big. Just ill fitting and not flattering. Love the color though.
The dress feels like paper literally like it can be torn.  Not worth your money
It looks nice online but the quality bits very poor. I sent it back as soon as I got it.
Super cute dress and very flattering! It fits true to size. I got many compliments on it!
Fit well and flattering on all body types.
Super cute & tts!!
Would be adorable if the shoulders weren’t so puffy.  Looks great with boots. Like the material, comfortable. But hate the shoulders

Quality is good. Fit is perfect. The dress is really pretty. It comes very wrinkled and is hard to smooth out. Definitely need a steamer, or to soak and then hang dry. The length sits mid thigh and the sleeve fit well. I'm 5'8" for reference. Wear large 10/12 in most things. M/L shirt.
Cute dress but the waist is too high and comes just under the bust line.

评论概述: bust is very small.  I will not try your dresses again.
评论详情: Very small through the bust.
Perfect dress! Wore this to a fall wedding and I also have it in blue. Great length and goes with so many shoe options.
Absolutely love this dress. I’m trying to make it normal to wear the same dress to multiple events that the same people will be at. It’s comfy and flattering all at the same time.
Nice fall colors but too short for 5’11 40 year old.

评论概述: Pretty, but material is so THIN!
评论详情: Beautiful dress, but the material is more like a negligee. I am not returning it, but will not buy any more. It is doubtful it will hold up well... and I will wear it with a body-length slip, despite the paper-thin lining. Just poor quality overall.
Love this dress! Flattering and classy. Was a good length for dancing at a wedding!

评论概述: Got Stopped and Complimented All Day Long
评论详情: I recently wore this dress for the first time to an all day event, throughout the event I was stopped by strangers almost an embarrassing amount of times to receive compliments about my outfit/dress (I paired the black dress with some lace stockings and fringe boots). As a newly plus size woman (5'7", 200 lbs, D cup, I purchased size XL) it really gave me some confidence as this is not a regular occurrence for me since gaining weight. Will definitely be purchasing it again in some other colors/patterns.
Worked well w cowboy boots for wedding

I absolutely love this dress! I received so many compliments on this dress at the wedding I wore it to. It fits perfectly, it’s true to size, and the navy color is beautiful! It was so comfortable too!

I wore the green color to a vineyard wedding in October and got lots of compliments. The length was great for me (5'2") and it fit true to size. The pattern on the dress is pretty, but having the pattern on the sleeves as well makes the dress stand out. I love that it has a button option on the neckline, of you want it less busty.
True to size and actually looked like the picture!
Cheap , Looks cheap material thin .I will return don’t bother ordering. Fit was ok very short waisted must be flat chested to wear.
The material of this dress was SO thin!  The fit was very odd as well.  Would not purchase again.
Sheer dress, poor quality

评论概述: Don’t buy it for a last minute wear
评论详情: Dress is cute and fits nice. I was surprised how thin the material is since it’s marketed as a Fall dress. My only complaint is that it’s packaged in such a way that it’s incredibly wrinkled when it arrives, and the wash instructions are very limited. No dryer, no iron, no dry clean. Difficult to get the wrinkles out!!

I will keep it because it's good enough and I like the color/design. However, this was the most wrinkled item of clothing that I have ever received. The material is cheap and thin, and it's not the most flattering if you have a large chest. The waist ends up being right under your chest instead of at your actual waist. I ordered a high quality and more expensive dress with this one, and they arrived on the same day. I think that just emphasized the low quality and inferior fit even more.
Perfect for fall wedding. Felt a little cheaply made but held up nicely. Hard to get the wrinkles out from shipping. True to size, great length, love the sheer sleeves. Decent price.
Very beautiful unique dress. Lots of compliments
I really wanted to love this dress.  It just doesn't flatter my body at all.  I'm 5'3 , 170, and a 42DDD.

评论概述: Loved! Perfect fit. I wear XL and XL fit perfect.
评论详情: Loved! Perfect fit. I wear XL and XL fit perfect.
I was worried about buying a dress online but let me tell you this dress Fit perfectly! Very pretty flowers. It’s has a slip underneath .
The perfect fall dress for photos! The material is thin but didn’t bother me. I am 5’10” - 170 ish lbs (2.5 months postpartum) and ordered a size large!

The dress is very cheaply made with poor quality materials. It was snug on me in all the wrong places. The cinched waist sits awkwardly in the wrong spot no matter how I adjust it. It made me look much lumpier than I am. It’s not at all flattering. Also, the snap on the front sits oddly. It’s not well placed. Not my favorite dress. I passed it on to my daughter. It didn’t fit her well either. I’m just hoping she grows into it some.
Thin (almost see through), poor quality. For the price you should buy elsewhere and get better quality.

评论概述: This dress is very see through
评论详情: The style was great but the material was very thin and see through.
Great fit, flowey, and beautiful
This dress is a big NO for me. I am 5’4, 135lbs and ordered this dress in 3 colors size Medium. Very ill fitting and frumpy around the bust, as well as cheap, flimsy material. I do not recommend.

I ordered this as an upcoming wedding guest dress and it's absolutely perfect. I am 5'10" and ordered an XL. I'm just so pleased, it's fitted at the top but flowy in all the right spots. sleeves are sheer and just super elegant. I'm tall and it's an appropriate length for this occasion. Makes me feel pretty. Buy it!!
Definitely not for a big busted woman at any size. I wear a six or eight in pants and a large in tops And this was too small. Has an elastic waist. Not nearly as pretty as it could be. Returned.
Wore this for a fall baby shower and fall wedding.  Got a lot of compliments.  Fits true to size and very flattering.  I tried on a lot of other dresses and this was the clear winner.
Wore it to the occasion for which I ordered it. Fitted well and looks good!

评论概述: Lovely Bright Print on Cheap Material
评论详情: I am a big curvy gal, with a chest to match and I fell in love with the print. It feels really skimpy on, so I will definitely be wear shorts underneath to avoid a Marilyn Monroe episode with the smallest breeze. I am keeping it for the print although I think there are a lot of drawbacks to this dress.  Pros: Deeply hued color print Fits as expected Cons: Cheap material feel Sleeves are not sheer on the colored print (ok by me, but you should know) Material is quite thin and there is no lining anywhere Puffed shoulders date it Definitely feels like it won't last more than a few wears Comes vacuum packed which means it is VERY wrinkled on arrival
My wife loved the style and fit. Everything about it was just like they said it would be. Would definitely buy it again.
Cute Dress - I bought for baby shower and will wear with boots!

评论概述: Dress is lovely, and as pictured
评论详情: I really love this dress, it's comfy and stylish! It came as described, and I would recommend this brand/seller to anyone looking for something fun and sweet. The length is perfect and the sheer sleeves will be perfect for a fall wedding here in Southern California.

评论概述: Perfect dress for a wedding guest!!
评论详情: I wore this for my niece’s wedding and it was perfect! I received so many compliments! The dress is light and it fit perfectly (size small). Only slight downside is that it wrinkles easily BUT nothing that a steamer won’t fix! I’ll be buying this dress in more colors!!

Beautiful dress, very comfortable but the button across the chest kept coming undone every time I breathed. It was the most annoying and embarrassing thing because I kept flashing my bra to people if I even thought about moving. The dress fit perfectly and I couldn’t have gone any bigger without it being baggy but I guess because I’m still breast feeding my chest is bigger than the dress anticipated?
I would definitely order this again. Very comfortable. This is a large.
This dress was perfect for fall engagement party.  Fit was nice, length was perfect for me.  5’4” size 8, medium

This dress was perfect for the occasion. It was an outdoor event so I was concerned it may get too chilly (68-74 degrees that day) but believe it or not the sleeves did protect my arms from the cool breeze. It was the perfect length so no worries of accidentally flashing anyone! The elastic band was stretchy and not too tight. The only downside was it arrived in a plastic bag so it was very wrinkled and it must be lightly steamed due to material it cannot go into the dryer or ironed. Overall I was very pleased with this dress!
This dress fit really nicely and was everything I thought it would be.

I bought this dress for an upcoming wedding. I liked that it had just enough of a pattern that it wasn't quite as formal as an all black dress. It's lined and comfortable. The sleeves are sheer but give enough coverage. A great dress for the price.

I am 5’3” and 185lbs and ordered a large.  I loved the overall fit of this dress!  The length hit right above my knees and I paired the dress with some high tan cowgirl boots. The color and pattern match what is shown in the pictures.  I must admit I am not a fan of dresses but, I am trying to step out of my comfort zone.  I ordered the blue/floral and the black/floral with the intention of returning the one I liked the least.  I loved them both so, I decided to keep them both! I have to say I felt extremely comfortable and confident wearing this and can’t wait to get to wear one of them again!

The Dress fits great for my frame of 5'9" and 143 lbs, I ordered a Large for the chest and length.  I only gave 4 stars because when I ironed it, it left the pattern behind on my ironing board cover (i seen blue outline with pinkish flowers.  It didn't seem to affect the dress.  This will be a fun winter dress with boots
This dress was beautiful and comfortable! It was the perfect fall wedding dress. I would buy again!
Fit was perfect good quality comfortable color is great

I get so many compliments when I wear this dress
Overall the quality is bad. It’s very thin, and the material feels like it would fall apart after one wash. Tons of static cling. It’s disappointing because the pattern is so cute.
I love this dress it is so pretty and fits great.  Fits true to size maybe a little big.

This dress was very flattering.  It fit true to size.  I am 5'6" and about 200 lbs and purchased an XL.  The only reason that I did not give the dress 5 stars was that it road up significantly when I raised my arms overhead.  I wore this to a wedding and did not want to be the guest wearing the v-dress.
I love the length and fit beautifully!  This is a great purchase.
I bought this dress for my 50th class reunion! Such cute colors in it!
The dress is very poorly made and the fabric is very thin. Gives a very cheap look.

评论概述: Cute dress but didn't like how it looked on me
评论详情: The fabric and quality of the material were adequate.  I didn't care for the snap on the cleavage line and it was a little "poofy" for my body style so it's getting returned.
